articles.title: Scientists Discover Ancient “Swamp Dweller” From the Age of the Dinosaurs in Colorado - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Colorado paleontologists found a rare fossil mammal, Heleocola piceanus, from 70-75 million years ago. The discovery shows some ancient mammals were larger than previously thought. A team of paleontologists near Rangely, Colorado, has discovered a new (or rat…
